display_long_description:
Frozen shoulder can make everyday movement feel frustrating and limiting. Reach VR offers an engaging, game-based way to explore shoulder movement through immersive virtual experiences designed around how you move.

Every journey begins by understanding your current movement range. Reach VR uses an interactive movement check to understand how your shoulder moves today. That information powers adaptive gameplay that responds to your unique movement patterns, ensuring each game adjusts dynamically as you play.

Forget repetitive drills. Reach VR transforms movement into immersive VR games that evolve with you. Each game uses sophisticated algorithms to scale difficulty in real time, encouraging comfortable exploration of movement while keeping challenges achievable and motivating.

Catch glowing fireflies in a peaceful forest, reaching higher as the world responds to you. Step into space and defend against incoming threats, where every motion drives the action. These playful environments turn movement into something engaging, rewarding, and fun.

Track your progress visually with the Reach Dashboard. See movement trends over time, unlock milestones, and stay motivated by watching your gameplay evolve as your movement changes. Reach VR makes movement feel interactive, personalized, and empowering—at your own pace.
